testCase.name: RetryManager Basic Retry Logic should retry failed tests up to maxRetries
RetryManager Basic Retry Logic should stop retrying after success
RetryManager Exponential Backoff should apply exponential backoff between retries
RetryManager Selective Retry should only retry on specific error types
RetryManager Selective Retry should retry on timeout if configured
RetryManager Retry Statistics should generate statistics for retry results
CircuitBreaker should open circuit after threshold failures
CircuitBreaker should close circuit after successful execution
